price: Bukankah Aku telah memerintahkan kepadamu hai Bani Adam supaya kamu tidak menyembah setan? Sesungguhnya setan itu adalah musuh yang nyata bagi kamu",
arabic: ۞ أَلَمۡ أَعۡهَدۡ إِلَيۡكُمۡ يَٰبَنِيٓ ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعۡبُدُواْ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam aʿhad ilaykum yābanī ādama an lā taʿbudū al-shayṭāna innahu lakum ʿaduwwun mubīnun
